meanings.definition: A person who strengthens and enlarges the muscles of their body through exercise.
meanings.sent1: Many bodybuilders lift heavy weights to build strong muscles.
meanings.sent2: The gym was full of bodybuilders working out and sweating.
meanings.sent3: The bodybuilders joked about flexing their muscles in the mirror.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fitness, bodybuilders are like sculptors shaping their bodies.
meanings.sent5: The bodybuilders' dedication to training is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals who engage in the practice of bodybuilding.
meanings.sent1: Bodybuilders often compete in bodybuilding competitions to showcase their physique.
meanings.sent2: The bodybuilders gathered at the event shared tips on diet and training.
meanings.sent3: At the bodybuilders' meet-up, they discussed their favorite protein shakes.
meanings.sent4: The community of bodybuilders supports each other in achieving their fitness goals.
meanings.sent5: The bodybuilders' camaraderie is evident in their shared passion for bodybuilding.
